txt.en: 'Many creatures make their homes in Tal Methedras.'
'The oxen of the Falcon clan graze upon the grassy shores.'
'Beware of the crawling avanc! Their teeth are sharp, and their bite fierce!'
'The toads will not bother you if you leave them alone.'
'There are many preparations still to be made.'
'My son has seen strange lights over the lake at night.'
